T-Dose 2014 25 10 2014 
Free And Open Source Software In Europe Policies And Implementations, Gijs Hillenius 

This talk will give an overview of the use of free and open source software solutions by public administrations in the European Union. It will outline the major trends and give plenty of examples of public administrations that jointly develop, share and re-use such software
solutions.

Gijs Hillenius is news editor for the European Commission's Open Source
Observatory & Repository (OSOR.eu), part of Joinup.ec.europa.eu

OSOR & Joinup are projects by the European Commission on the sharing and
reuse of software, by public administrations across Europe.

T-DOSE is a free and yearly event held in The Netherlands to promote use and development of Open Source Software. During this event Open Source projects, developers and visitors can exchange ideas and knowledge. This years event will be held on 25 and 26 October 2014 at the Fontys University of Applied Science in Eindhoven.
Kernel.
title: T-Dose 2014 Free And Open Source Software In Europe Policies And Implementations, Gijs Hillenius
